verses.roman:
'viṣādi khāñā haridāsa ātma-ghāta kaila
sei pāpe jāni 'brahma-rākṣasa' haila

synonyms: viṣa-ādi khāñā—by drinking poison; haridāsa—Junior Haridāsa; ātma-ghāta kaila—has committed suicide; sei pāpe—on account of that sinful activity; jāni—we understand; brahma-rākṣasa—a brāhmaṇa ghost; haila—he has become.
translation: "Haridāsa must have committed suicide by drinking poison, and because of this sinful act, he has now become a brāhmaṇa ghost.
